trigger.name: ANC.B10. Counselling, in-facility management & treatment – 8. IPV first-line support and care

action.title: Provide first-line support. Four (4) kinds of needs deserve attention:– Immediate emotional/psychological health needs– Immediate physical health needs– Ongoing safety needs– Ongoing support and mental health needs.
action.description: Provide first-line support. Four (4) kinds of needs deserve attention:– Immediate emotional/psychological health needs– Immediate physical health needs– Ongoing safety needs– Ongoing support and mental health needs.
action.textEquivalent:
Conduct the following 5 tasks: 
– Listen to the woman closely, with empathy, and without judging
– Inquire about needs and concerns: assess and respond to her various needs and concerns – emotional, physical, social and practical (e.g. childcare)
– Validate: show her that you understand and believe her; assure her that she is not to blame
– Enhance saftey: discuss a plan to protect herself from further harm if violence occurs again
– Support her by helping her connect to information, services and social support.
